duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage all aspects of wireless security programs by scoping projects, acquiring resources, working with engineers to create achievable roadmaps, and influencing external teams to expand the program.
Monitor progress, track findings, and communicate results and blockers effectively.
Drive detailed business and technical discussions clearly and concisely up to the VP level and work with teams across Amazon to strategically improve wireless security.
Answer external inquiries and implement security best practices, support large-scale security projects, and escalate effectively when needed.
Develop and mentor other TPMs within the team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in a management discipline (Preferred Master's)
